snippet: After months of searching for a new location, Alex’s MVP Cards and Comics has found a new home in Yorkville.
abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Alex's MVP Cards and Comics, newly relocated to York Avenue in Yorkville section of Manhattan; owner Alex Gregg lost his lease on store's original East 89th street location after 26 years.
lead_paragraph: After months of searching for a new location, Alex’s MVP Cards and Comics has found a new home in Yorkville.

headline.print_headline: Change, Slower Than a Speeding Bullet
headline.seo: Alex’s MVP Cards and Comics in Yorkville Finds a New Home. It’s Still Tiny.
headline.main: Change, Slower Than a Speeding Bullet
